## FindClaimsArgs type

> This API is provided as a preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.

The filter that can be used to find [VerifiableCredential](./core.verifiablecredential.md)s in the data store, based on the types and values of their claims.

See [IDataStoreORM.dataStoreORMGetVerifiableCredentialsByClaims()](./core.idatastoreorm.datastoreormgetverifiablecredentialsbyclaims.md) This API may change without a BREAKING CHANGE notice.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type FindClaimsArgs = FindArgs<TClaimsColumns>
```

<b>References:</b> [FindArgs](./core.findargs.md), [TClaimsColumns](./core.tclaimscolumns.md)
